NAME: Entrance
DESCRIPTION: A dark room with only one way in or out to the north.

NAME: Hall
DESCRIPTION: An empty hallway with a blockage ahead and doors on either side.

NAME: Bedroom
DESCRIPTION: A solitary room with a single bed in it - perhaps you would like a rest?

NAME: Armory
DESCRIPTION: An empty armory where warriors used to receive their weapons. There is a trapdoor opening on the north end of the room.

NAME: Dungeon 1
DESCRIPTION: You go down the trapdoor into what was the castle dungeon. There are blood stains on the floor.

NAME: Bathroom
DESCRIPTION: There is a toilet in here! Reminds me of a certain player..

NAME: Secret Stash Room
DESCRIPTION: There has got to be treasure in here!

NAME: Staircase
DESCRIPTION: Stairs to heaven... Wow heaven isn't looking too good...

NAME: Cavern
DESCRIPTION: Looks a bit wet from the water dripping from the stalag.. pointy things

NAME: Waterfall Rooms
DESCRIPTION: I told you it was wet!

NAME: Cavern Upper Level
DESCRIPTION: Look out for fly balls on the upper deck

NAME: Cavernous Hallway
DESCRIPTION: I'm surprised that I fit

NAME: Goblin Gang Hideout Entrance
DESCRIPTION: This looks like a nice neighborhood

NAME: Food Hall
DESCRIPTION: Smells like fried chiken -- I should call Leeroy

NAME: Tavern
DESCRIPTION: Goblin swill -- very good for digesiton

NAME: Kitchen
DESCRIPTION: Goblins - now with cleavers!

NAME: Cavernous Hallway
DESCRIPTION: I'm surprised that I fit two electic boogaloo

NAME: Training Camp
DESCRIPTION: Maybe try to avoid all the enemies here - Stealthy time!

NAME: Storage Room
DESCRIPTION: Goblins are so nice - leaving their best weapons here for me and all

NAME: Goblin Gang Leader Throne Room
DESCRIPTION: Thats a nice throne made of bones
